ANU.name: Corinne Walsh
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
ANU.biography: Corinne has a Masters degree in Applied Anthropology and Participatory Development (MAAPD) from the ANU (2015), as well as a Bachelor of Arts in Anthropology and Sociology from Macquarie University (2008).

publication.title: Dignified Relationships: Repatriation, healing, and reconciliation
publication.source: in C Fforde, C T McKeown & H Keeler (ed.), The Routledge Companion to Indigenous Repatriation: Return, Reconcile, Renew, Routledge, Oxon United Kingdom, pp. 745-768
Exploring the potential of Justice Reinvestment in Cowra
